profile:
DAVESDUCTS (formerly DAVE'S DUCT CLEANING)are CERTIFIED members of the NATIONAL AIR DUCT CLEANER'S ASSOCIATION (NADCA), HRAI, TSSA and Ambassadors of the QUALIFIED AIR DUCT CLEANING AFFILIATION (QUADCA) We are also an ACCREDITED BUSINESS listed with the BETTER BUSINESS BUREAU (BBB), AN OFFICIAL BAEUMLER APPROVED CONTRACTOR an OFFICIAL AIR MILES Reward Miles Sponsor and are the OFFICIAL DUCT CLEANING PARTNERS of HABITAT FOR HUMANITY Durham and Greater Toronto Area.

SERVICES INCLUDE: Furnace and AC Repair, Service and Installation, Tankless Water Heater Installation, HVAC installation and Design, Indoor Air Quality, AEROSEAL Duct Sealing and NADCA Certified Duct Cleaning

STANDARDIZED PRICING: $379 + tax up to 16 vents, each additional vent is $5

Give us a call at 416-668-4607 or email info@davesducts.com, we PROMISE we won't let you down!

-----------
FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM! www.instagram.com/davesducts
LIKE US ON FACEBOOK!
https://www.facebook.com/davesductsinc
service_area:
DID YOU KNOW?
- our rate is standardized for residential duct cleaning: $299 + hst up to 15 vents, each additional vent is $5.
- for crawlspaces, multiple furnaces, condos, commercial buildings, industrial spaces, furnace blower/ac coil cleaning and dryer vent cleaning - please call 416-668-4607 or email info@davesducts.com
- we want you to be happy with our service, if there is anything that you are not happy with before, during or after our service; let us know - we'll be happy to correct it; we want you to know that we value your business and will always ensure we perform this service properly and thoroughly for you and your home.
- we encourage you to shadow us as we work; we have nothing to hide; we want you to know everything about the work we are doing in your home so if you've got questions...ask away!
- all our air duct cleaning technicians have passed numerous background checks for your security, comfort and peace of mind! We are all BackCheck verified!
- we believe that consumers have the right to know everything about the services they're receiving in their home; QUADCA was created to help and protect consumers from "blow and go" air duct cleaning companies - we are the official QUADCA Ambassador for the Greater Toronto Area. Visit www.quadca.com for more information!
- for a company to be considered NADCA certified, they are only required to have 1 ASCS (Air Systems Cleaning Specialist); We have EIGHT (8) ASCS Technicians and NINE (9) VMTs (Ventilation Maintenance Technicians) to serve you and your home!
- we also have (6) SIX CVI (Certified Ventilation Inspectors) on staff that can inspect your residential, commercial or industrial HVAC systems.
- NADCA publishes the names of individuals that hold the ASCS designation, make sure your home is being cleaned by a certified and qualified individual; to find out if your technician is certified, please visit: www.nadca.com
- ASCS is the HIGHEST level of certification you can possess; VMT is the bare MINIMUM level of certification your cleaning technician should possess
- We will only send ASCS cleaning technicians to perform our service in your home!
- we DO NOT sub-contract our work and DO NOT telemarket
- we maintain 3 vehicles, 1 inspection vehicle and have 10 employees on payroll with full health benefits
- we are members of WSIB and have $5M in comprehensive business liability insurance
- we provide PROOF OF WORK by taking before/after pictures; this is the only way we know an HVAC system is thoroughly cleaned!
- your service should take between 2-3 hours with a 2 person crew (based on a 2000-3000 sq ft home)
- we are only able to accommodate 3 jobs maximum per day per vehicle
- if a job takes longer than anticipated to complete, we will always stay as long as it takes to complete the job properly and will always advise our customers accordingly
- your service can be performed with either truck mounted, van mounted or portable HEPA filtered vacuums; all these machines conform to NADCA standards and will yield the same results: CHECK OUT THIS VIDEO: http://bit.ly/1h78y0X
- the length of time it takes to clean an HVAC system is NOT dependent on type of equipment used; provided equipment conforms to NADCA standards
- time it takes to clean an HVAC system is dependent on: 1) ACCESS 2) SIZE OF HVAC SYSTEM 3) TYPE OF HVAC SYSTEM 4) OTHER SERVICES PERFORMED - each HVAC system is different and should be treated as such!
- NADCA certified professionals have the ability to properly assess, maintain and restore all types of HVAC systems
- your vents should always be sealed during the cleaning process
- when done properly, your HVAC system need not be cleaned for at least 5-7 years (under normal living conditions).
- for more information, we've compiled various resources (videos and cleaning standards) to educate you and your family better, copy and paste the following link: http://www.davesducts.com/faq/consumer-education

To view our service area map, copy and paste the following link: http://bit.ly/U3Pt5c

For references (as early as today) or questions about your HVAC system or just to say 'hello' - please call! (416) 668-4607 or visit: www.davesducts.com - WE LOOK FORWARD TO SERVING YOU AND YOUR HOME!
hours: 8:30am - 3pm (We budget 3 jobs MAX per vehicle per day)

profile:
From the first day that we opened our doors, our mission at Temp-A-Sure has always been to help our customers and their families stay comfortable no matter what the weather looks like outside!

As heating and air conditioning specialists based in Toronto and serving the GTA, we take our role seriously; after all, your home is a big investment, and your heating and cooling systems should run smoothly year-round.

All of our Temp-A-Sure team members are trained heating and air conditioning specialists… and this include our top management. We know that it can be a challenge to decide which people to bring into your home to work on your furnace, air conditioner, hot water tank and/or gas line. That’s why we’ve built a reputation in the Toronto region for excellence.

profile:
WE are open 24/7. We currently have safety procedures in place and are operating contact free service. At Hoerner Plumbing, there is an operator on Duty 24/7, so you will always speak with a person, we will provide you with an exact 2 hour arrival window, our trucks are well stocked, often we can do it all with just one service call,  we clean up so well and it is like we were never there.
 
Services that we provide for PLUMBING are, Install & repair toilet.
Install & repair faucets, Install service to tankless water heaters Install Sewage ejectors as well as install sump pump.
Services that we provide for HEATING are Install service to tankless water heater. Install & service high efficiency boilers for your home. Boiler Service. Service to radiant floor heating systems.
Install & repair Radiators.
Services that we provide for DRAINS are: service to clogged pipes and drains. Camera inspection of drains. Install repair main line backwater valves to protect your home from city back-up.
Install & service to sewage ejector & sump pumps. Hydronic heating or hot water heating
 
Yes! Andrew Hoerner Pledges 100% Satisfaction Guarantee, or we will redo the repair for no added fee.

profile:
AtlasCare has been a family-run local business for 88 years with one goal: to always be there when you need us. As an essential service, we may be needed now more than ever. A breakdown or necessary replacement of your HVAC or plumbing system can be critical - especially as many of us are still confined to our homes. At AtlasCare we are dedicated to the health and safety of our team members, our customers and our community. That's why we're taking extensive precautions before we enter your home bu disinfecting trucks and tools, washing hands, wearing proper protection equipment, and disinfecting anything we touch. Most of the work we do does not require any interaction with customers - approvals and payments are contactless. 
⁣
When you book an appointment:⁣
⁣
- We send you a photo of the technician who will be visiting your home. ⁣
- We let you know we’re on the way and show up on time. ⁣
- We lay down a red carpet and wear booties over our shoes to protect your floors. ⁣
- We clean up when we’re finished so you’d never know we were there.⁣
⁣
Since 1932, families in the Greater Toronto Area have counted on AtlasCare to provide exceptional ⁣
heating, cooling and ventilation products, including furnace repair, air conditioner service, water heater ⁣
maintenance, smart thermostat installation, plumbing, drain clearing and more.⁣
⁣
Our exceptional service and support team has received recognition from numerous consumer and industry ⁣
awards, including:⁣
⁣
- HomeStars Best of 2020 Award (GTA) ⁣
- Top Choice Air Conditioning and Heating Company of 2020 in the Greater Toronto Area ⁣
- 2020 Consumer Choice Award for Air Conditioning and Heating Contractors in the Greater Toronto Area ⁣
- 2019 Mississauga and Brampton's Readers' Choice Award ⁣
- 2019 Lennox Partner of the Year Award (Toronto District)⁣
⁣
Call AtlasCare 24/7 for award-winning furnace, air conditioning, plumbing or duct cleaning service in the Greater ⁣Toronto Area.

profile:
Constant Home Comfort provides professional and reliable service and installation of furnace and air conditioners in the Ontario. Our strength is in matching you with available rebates depending on your location availability. Our clients may be presented with a zero down payment, high-efficiency furnace or AC installed fast + rebates depending on what we get them approved for. Call us anytime for a quick price quote and rebate eligibility. 
 
We have local technicians at each of our locations in GTA Toronto, Hamilton, Oakville, Kanata-Ottawa, London, Waterloo and Windsor. 25% discount while energy rebates are available up to $5,000 for AC, Furnace, HEPA, Tankless Water Heater.

Choose from a variety of high-end brands including Lennox, American Standard, Daikin, Armstrong Air and Keeprite. There are various features and upgrades for you to choose from including smart control panels! Enjoy a top-of-the-line appliance upgrade from the best price after rebates, including installation! We have high client satisfaction as we offer exceptional service in a timely manner! We only install top of line energy-efficient products that will last you a lifetime. We will explain to you in-depth how to maximize your savings and maintain comfort all year round in your home. We are customer-focused.

profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyone’s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

profile:
Air In Motion Heating + Cooling is an established company with a proven track record. We specialize in comfort solutions and also respond quickly to no heating calls, no cooling calls, leaking water heaters, and we service and install furnaces, air conditioners, water heaters, thermostats, indoor air quality products resolving indoor air quality issues or problems with mould, ventilation and other indoor air common problems. We have 17 years of experience in this industry and deliver the best quality workmanship. Any HVAC Issues big or small Air In Motion Heating + Cooling is the company to call. We also have a Master Electrician and a Certified Plumber on staff as well to help you with any issues you have with your electrical or plumbing needs at home from replacing electrical panels, safety inspections, replacing toilets, sinks, fixing leaks or installing hot water tanks to boiler systems.

   “ All electrical work is subcontracted to ECRA/ESA Licensed Electrical Contractors. "

profile:
We are qualified full-service HVAC and Electrical Contractor, providing optimum Heating, Air Conditioning, Indoor Air Quality and Electrical Services to residents of Toronto since 1997. 
Our electricians are Master Electricians and our HVAC technicians are natural gas, propane and oil certified.
When you work with us, you have confidence that all installation, replacements and repairs carried out to comply with manufacturer instructions, and all the regulations with regard to Electrical(ESA), and Gas & Refrigeration(TSSA) are taken into account.

For more than 20 years, we build our business trust and reputation, by providing the best products and services to our clients. We design fully customized Heating, Cooling and Electrical solutions for every customer, providing the best match for your needs and budget.
If you are interested to get your new heating or cooling system with easy and low monthly payment plans, we are partner with Financeit, which is a leading company in financing.

Call (416)-822-9030
Whether you live in a heritage home or a newly built home, you can trust House Depot Home Services for the best results for your ultimate satisfaction.

profile:
Heating & Air Conditioning

COOLING
At Belyea Bros. we install and service a range of air conditioning systems including forced air (central) air conditioning, ductless split air conditioners, and our custom designed Attic Pak and SpacePak systems. Due to our background as a hot water heating specialists we are experts at planning and executing cooling solutions for houses without ductwork.

HEATING
At Belyea Bros. Limited we hold the first heating license issued in Toronto. As a result, we have the experience to claim, “there is nothing about heating we don’t know”. We are experts in hot water, radiant in-floor, snow melt systems and forced air heating. Over a number of years we have carefully selected the products that we recommend to our customers. We sell only manufacturers that have a proven track record of quality and service so that we can offer you the best support possible. All the manufacturers we work with have parts centers or distributors within the GTA meaning we have access to a local support network. We offer only reliable premium equipment.

HOT WATER TANKS 
Water heater rentals are a great solution for many homeowners who have a short-to-medium time frame in their house, own a tenanted property, are looking for a peace-of-mind solution to address their domestic hot water needs, or simply wish to have a clear idea of their monthly house budget over the long term without the worry of heater repairs.

Many consumers are confused by which company they actually rent their water heater from, thinking that because the charge appears on their gas bill that they rent from “gas-company”. In fact, most customers in Toronto rent their heaters from Centrica PLC, an international energy services company based in the United Kingdom, which operates in Canada under the brand name Direct Energy™. Although they bill on the gas bill, they are not, in any way, affiliated with your gas utility.

Belyea Bros. has a wide range of hot water tank solutions for your family’s needs. We have an excellent rental program providing a comparable rate and great reliable products. We provide a fix rate increase, unlike the other guys who may raise your billing at anytime. 

TANKLESS HOT WATER
Tankless hot water heaters are common in Europe and Japan. They can supply an endless supply of hot water, with greater energy savings than conventional tanks. They are, however, limited in the amount of hot water that can be produced at one time and the upfront costs are higher.

ELECTRICAL SERVICE
Belyea Bros. Electrical specializes in helping home and business owners in the older neighborhoods of Toronto. We provide electrical service, repair and installation whether it’s diagnosing and fixing a broken outlet, or re-wiring your whole home, Belyea Bros. Electrical is here to help.

profile:
At Reliance, the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are synonymous for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

Reliance Home Comfort has been delivering high quality home comfort products and services for over 40 years. Specializing in furnaces, air conditioners, water heaters and plumbing, we provide our customers with peace of mind and are with you every step of the way. When you choose Reliance, you’re choosing one of the largest HVAC providers in Canada, with over 1.7 million customers and growing. You can expect your call to be answered 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. With one of the largest networks of licensed technicians in Canada, we respond to over 500,000 service calls each year.

profile:
TWINTECH is a full-service HVAC care and maintenance provider located in Pickering, Ontario and servicing Ajax, Pickering, Whitby, Oshawa and the Greater Toronto Area. The company is owned and operated by Grant and Greg Dainty, third generation HVAC technicians.
Over the years, TWINTECH has developed an outstanding reputation for both the quality of our installations and high level of customer service in the Greater Toronto Area and surrounding areas.
TWINTECH recognizes the need for crucial preventative maintenance and repair of residential HVAC systems, and as a result, our company has gone to great lengths to bring together a highly trained service team whom our customers can count on during any heating and air conditioning emergency.
As a TWINTECH customer, you can rest assured that with any visit to your home comes with friendly, professional service and over 30 years of reliable, knowledgeable expertise.

Our History
Grant and Greg owe their business prowess to their grandfather, Tom Rodman, who perfected his skills in the sheet metal trade while working at the General Motor's plant in Oshawa before founding his own business, Rodman Sheet Metal, in 1949, during a time when sheet metal fittings were still produced by hand. Tom and his staff are responsible for the installation of hundreds of oil furnaces and duct systems in homes that were built across Ajax, Pickering, Whitby and Oshawa during the 1950s and 60s. Rodman Sheet Metal was eventually renamed to Rodman Heating.
In 1972, Greg and Grant's father, Ron Dainty, a certified Tool & Die Maker, joined the Rodman Heating team as a sheet metal apprentice. Ron expanded his skill set to include an expertise in oil and natural gas furnaces and central air conditioning. By 1975, Tom was ready to retire his tool belt, and handed the reigns of the business over to Ron. Under Ron's leadership, the company was once again re-branded, this time to reflect their new service offerings – Rodman Heating & Air Condition
Curious as youngsters, Greg and Grant grew up immersed in the family business. During the late 70s, they worked part time as summer students alongside their father. After graduating from college, the twins both took on full-time roles in family business, taking advantage of hands on learning in every aspect of the heating and cooling business. From the sweat and toil of the sheet metal shop producing custom duct work by hand, to the installing furnaces and air conditioners, to answering the phones and going on late-night service calls, they could do it all.  
When it was Ron's turn to retire and sell the business, Grant and Greg decided to translate their hands-on experience into a successful brand of their own, and so TWINTECH was born.
With over 30 years of experience under their belts and an unparalleled reputation for delivering superior service, TWINTECH has been able to develop and maintain the long-term customer relationships that make them the envy of the industry.

profile:
Aeroseal Tech specializing in Aeroseal Technology and other ways  to improve Air Quality, Air Volume and Velocity for residential and commercial buildings. We take on jobs ranging from simple to complicated and perform all work with the utmost attention to detail and customer service. This way we are able to achieve the best results for our customers which we guarantee for 10 years!
Aeroseal Duct Sealing is a patented breakthrough technology that tackles leaks from the inside out. Aeroseal software allows the technician to accurately measure the duct leakage in residential homes and commercial buildings. The Aeroseal process puts escaping air under pressure and causes polymer particles to stick first to the edges of a leak, then to each other until the leak is closed.

The technology was developed within the Indoor Environment Program at Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, whose IAQ scientists tested it. The research was funded by US Environmental protection agency, US dept. of Energy, Electric Power Research Institute and California Institute of Energy and Environment.

The University of California was granted initial patents in 1996 and 1999, and Aeroseal holds an exclusive license to the technology.

Our Mission Statement:

Vision:
To be the most reliable, customer oriented, fastest growing heating, air conditioning and Power backup service provider, offering the best price possible, superior installations, maintenance and repair services. To be the best company in terms of value, customer service, employee talent and consistent, profitable growth and giving back in the communities where we live and work.

We are committed to providing the highest quality and performance in all aspects of HVAC and Generator service and replacement business.

profile:
AccuServ Heating and Air conditioning has been serving our community for over 20 years providing high quality repairs and installs. We're so dedicated to this goal that we have provided a series of guarantees to ensure your experience with our company is not just a good one, but a great one.
To learn more about our company you can visit us by clicking the buttons below: 
www.accuservheating.com 

https://www.facebook.com/AccuServHeating?ref=hl

Our Guarantees to You;
On time or We pay You!
We value your time! We have convenient appointment times to fit your busy schedule, 7 days a week. On top of that, if AccuServ's install team is more than 30 minutes late, we will write you a cheque for $200. We'll be on time no matter where we are on the atlas.

Straight forward Pricing.
We guarantee transparent and honest options for solving your home comfort problems. All upfront costs will be presented and explained before any work is started and will not begin without your approval.

Background Checked.
Our employees go through rigorous background checks to assure you that we do not allow criminals to enter your home under the AccuServ name. Several police and government references are used to ensure these recruitment standards are met.

Total Comfort Guarantee.
Our guarantees ensure that our installs provide reliable home comfort so that you have consistent fall, winter and spring home heating as well as dependable cooling during the summer.

No Lemon Guarantee.
All of our furnace and air conditioner installs come with a 12 year warranty to keep your world cozy. But, if for any reason a system has more then 3 failures during the first year of operation or doesn't stay at its core temperature, we will replace it at no charge and provide a new "no lemon" replacement.
Property Protection and Client Respect Guarantee.
Our technicians respect you and your home. They use due diligence to ensure your home stays clean and damage free . For the slim chance any damage is done, big or small, we will take full responsibility and pay for all repairs.

The AccuServ Difference.
When you allow an AccuServ representative to enter your home to service your needs, you can expect them to be well-mannered, clean-cut and professional. All of our staff wear popular white company branded uniforms and have clearly marked vehicles.

Accuserv Heating and Air conditioning provides you with all your HVAC needs, Including sales, installation and repair of your furnace, boiler and Air Conditioner.

profile:
Since established in 1983 Thermo Cool Mechanical has been providing heating, air conditioning, and ventilation (HVAC) services all over the Greater Toronto Area. Thermo Cool has grown significantly over the past 10 years. We have centered our attention to heating and cooling for high rise buildings.

All our technicians are fully trained and certified on all equipment we work on. Additionally, we are factory trained for most common brands of water source heat pumps. Our trucks are fully stocked with all the parts required to complete the job.

We offer custom replacement units to our condominium customers. Additionally, we provide indoor air quality products adaptable to condominium suites.

Our shop is a fully equipped repair shop for water source heat pumps. We properly clean and service all major repairs in shop. This allows us to complete the job properly and efficiently.

In recent years Thermo Cool has made it a goal to improve their customer service. We offer friendly dealings, along with twenty-four hour emergency service. Keeping our clients informed and educated is a must. We treat all of our customers and potential customers with respect, understanding the importance of their HVAC needs.

Our technicians carry some of the most advanced tools known to the trade, giving them an instant advantage over the competition. This not only provides the technician with more confidence, it also allows the customer to put their mind at ease.

Thermo Cool is concerned with energy management. The main advantages of energy management are: saving our customers money and assisting in the struggle against the depletion of our environment. By offering energy management tactics, such as digital thermostats and more advanced HVAC equipment, we can save our clients money, but more importantly reduce the harm being caused to our atmosphere.

profile:
Pacific Home Comfort Experts have proudly been in the heating and cooling business for almost 20 years. Our main business offers sales, service and installation of the best quality furnaces, air conditioners and indoor air quality products. We specialize in high quality equipment and installation.

Our professional, knowledgeable, friendly and courteous Home Comfort Experts are fully licensed, insured and covered by Workplace Safety & Insurance Board (WSIB), operates under the Technical Standards & Safety Authority (TSSA), and is a member of The Heating, Refrigeration & Air Conditioning Institute of Canada (HRAI).​

We make sure that all your needs and concerns are met. We will answer any questions or concerns about your equipment because we know that your cooling and heating equipment is a large investment.

We take pride in our work and use only the best and highest quality products and materials. We do not compromise quality for the price. We know that your heating and cooling systems are important to you. When you hire Pacific Home Comfort Experts’ services for your cooling, heating, and air quality solutions, rest assured you will be happy with our work. Your complete and total satisfaction is important to us. 

We continue to build our business with honesty, integrity and quality workmanship that keeps our clients coming back and referring us to new clients.​

profile:
About Us
For more than a decade, Eco Star Home Services Co. has dedicated itself in providing affordable and reliable home comfort solutions that every family deserves. We are a leading provider of furnaces, air conditioners, water heaters, water treatment systems, IAQ (indoor air quality) products, home insulation, maintenance and protection plans, and other HVAC (Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning) related services. At Eco Star, our goal is not simply selling HVAC products to you. We go above and beyond what you would expect from us. To us, your comfort does not only mean cool air for hot days or warm heats for cold days. It also means your experience in working with us is pleasant and satisfying. With this customer-first focus in mind, we carefully source and build up teams consisting of professional sales, experienced technicians and friendly customer services that you can trust and rely on. Our exceptional service has won us A+ BBB (Better Business Bureau) rating, and Best of 2020 Award from HomeStars. Eco Star serves over thousands of customers annually, and we hope to have you as a customer soon! We sincerely welcome you to visit our brand new 15,000sq feet showroom conveniently located off Hwy 404 and 407, where our friendly sales and customer service team will warmly greet you and answer all your questions. 

Thousands of old and new customers come back to us year after year because of:

Our History
Now, Then and Always, we will be here for you. Eco Star is not a flash-in-the-pan company. Established in 2008, and over the past 12 years, we have grown into a thriving company with a 5 million insurance coverage, and a brand new 15,000 sq feet showroom based in Markham. Our proudest accomplishment is the large number of long-term customers who year after year put their trust in us.

Our Attitude
What sets us apart from the competition is that we're passionate about the products and services we provide and quality of support. Quality is a word being used too often. But here, we mean it. At Eco Star, we listen carefully to customers’ needs and provide the solution most suitable for them. We encourage each other to achieve excellence in all endeavours and aren't satisfied until our customers are satisfied. We always welcome and act on your feedback so we can improve every aspect of our business. 

Our experience
To date, we have successfully provided over 15,000 heating, cooling, water heaters, and other related HVAC solutions to customers across the residential and commercial sectors. This extensive experience managing all types of HVAC projects means we will handle every detail and coordinate all aspects so you can rest assured that your project will be completed on time and on budget. And we don’t settle with “good enough”. Our sales and technicians are provided with continuing education opportunities on a regular basis to allow them to stay current with the latest products and technology. 

Our Support
We all know how frustrating it can be to have a problem and not get the support promptly. Our expert team is here to help you and we strive to provide the best customer service possible. To underscore that statement, on top of our standard, office-based support, available from 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday to Sunday, we take support one step further by offering 24/7 customer service! 

Our One-Stop Service
We handle all aspects of your HVAC related needs. We are here to offer you a one-stop service from finding the right product for your HVAC needs, explaining the rebate process, and arranging a Registered Energy Advisor. We take all stress of going through rebate application. Eco Star Home Services is a participating contractor with a wide variety of heating and cooling incentives programs. Receipt of Eligible Rebates Guaranteed!  We take care of the complicated stuff so you can take care of your family and work.

So, let's get started...
Looking for home comfort solutions? Look no further, give us a quick call at 416-321-8666, or simply send us an email at info@ecostarhomeservices.com to get your HVAC project rolling today. We know you won't be disappointed.

profile:
DeMarco Mechanical Services Inc. was established in 2005 by a young entrepreneur who was tired and frustrated of working for large corporations that relied on high pressure sales and scare tactics to sell equipment, lock people in to useless insurance plans and expensive contracts. DeMarco Mechanical Services is 100% Canadian and family owned. This company is built on and conducts itself with the concept of family in mind. We would not do work or leave a job that wasn’t good enough for us or our family. We are proud, consummate professionals who love what we do. Our reliability stands 2nd to none. When you call us there are no call centers or answering machines to hide behind. You get to speak to a local real live person who genuinely wants to help, not sell.

DeMarco Mechanical Services Inc. is a full service heating and cooling company.  Specializing in installation, service and maintenance of all gas fired and air conditioning equipment.  13 years in business repairing and installing equipment all over the GTA and Durham region. 


Special Offers:

1. Book a precision maintenance on your system and get a second piece of equipment inspected for half price.
2. Book an out of season single equipment precision maintenance and get 25% of the regular price
3. Sign up for our service and maintenance contracts and we will reduce the price of the precision maintenance by 25% on each piece of equipment.We will reduce the diagnostic fee by half and we will also give a 10% discount on parts and labor. No monthly payments or upfront cost to you.You only pay us when you see us
4. Furnace & Air conditioners installation starting at $1950.00 for each piece of a equipment.{selected equipment only}
5. Rewards program If you refer an installation to us and it sells we will reward you with a $50.00 gift certificate of your choice for each referral.
6. Property managers and Landloards offered special pricing

For great service contact us today!

profile:
We provide 24x7 service for all your household and business HVAC and Pump needs. The Boiler Shoppe installs products with longevity in mind. This statement might seem peculiar to some; however, we know from experience that with the correct infrastructure and installation, products will perform at optimal efficiency to deliver long service life.

We can ensure this level of quality, as we have close relationships with all the manufactures that we represent. This helps expedite warranty claims and ensure our customers receive the absolute best in class product solutions. We also offer a comprehensive maintenance plan that best suits the appliance and your home comfort needs.

profile:
We have established ourselves as an efficient and professional heating and air conditioning company with over 35 years experience in the HVAC field.

We are a licensed residential and commercial gas, refrigeration and air condition company with training in many manufactured furnace air condition, boiler, ductless and tankless etc.

A & A Heating has also helped provide practical training for young people through Technical Colleges in Ontario.

We provide free quotes and you can visit our showroom at 22 Steinway blvd Unit 20 by appointment only!

profile:
Category: Heating & Air Conditioning

Air Flex Heating and Cooling Limited has been providing its customers with the highest quality of service in the industry since 1993, with our expertise and professionalism we have quickly grown to become one of the region’s most trusted and reliable name in the Heating and Air Conditioning industry. We provide sales, service and installation of heating, cooling and air quality products to residential and commercial customers.
We offer products from some of the leading manufacturers of the world, such as Lennox Industries, International Product Corporation (ICP), Kingsmans Fireplaces, Honeywell, White Rodgers, GeneralAire and LG, just to name a few.
At Air Flex we have a reputation to protect, which is built on honesty, reliability and trust, one reason why our technicians constantly undergo factory and new product training to keep up with new technology so they can continue to provide the best level of service. We are also a member of Heating Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Contractors of Canada (HRAC) and the Better Business Bureau. 
As a registered Technical Standard and Safety Authority (TSSA) contractor, we are audited on a regular basis for quality assurance. Our TSSA number is 0076422963 and our metro license number is H16265.
Please browse through our product and service listing. If you have any questions please give us a call or send us an email. We will be more than happy to serve you.

profile:
ductless.ca Inc. is Toronto's leading ductless mini-split company, providing installation, service and sales for most homeowners and businesses in the Greater Toronto Area.
We are the absolute experts in ductless mini-splits and can help you find the perfect solution!
Our specialities include cooling and heating solutions for older homes with radiators, server room cooling for businesses, spot cooling and heating in newer homes, etc.
Brands of ductless mini-splits that we proudly install and service include; Mitsubishi, Panasonic, Daikin, Fujitsu, York, LG, Goodman, and many others.

We also install, sell and service most of the premier boiler and combi-boiler brands during the heating months, including; Baxi, Viessmann, Triangle Tube, NTI, Laars, and many more.
Our team of experts can help you find the best and most efficient system for heating your home through radiators, in-floor, snow-melt, etc.

For domestic hot water, we install, sell and service tankless systems for endless hot water. Brands we carry are Noritz.

We have thousands of satisfied customers and strive to exceed our customers expectations daily!

profile:
Dryer Vent Wizard was founded as a result of widespread safety and efficiency concerns among homeowners whose dryer vent systems required an “urgent response.” The unsettling state of most dryer vents in need of service is caused by one or more problems including lint accumulation, vent blockages, disrepair, or improper installation. Dryer Vent Wizard locations across North America combat these common issues by providing specialized dryer vent services including vent installation, cleaning, repair, rerouting, and inspection.

Since our beginning in 2004, the Dryer Vent Wizard franchise has grown and spread across the United States and Canada, working together to make each home or business we service safer and more efficient. Each Dryer Vent Wizard franchisee is committed to making their community safer by offering thorough, professional dryer vent services. We professionally clean, repair, and install dryer vents. Over 100 locations. Dryer Vent East York and The Beaches is now in Toronto. 

To learn more about Dryer Vent Wizard of East York and The Beaches in Toronto and how we can make your home safer while saving you time, money, and energy, call (647) 499-5874, or visit www.EastYorkDryerVent.com.

profile:
Welcome to Modify Air - We offer services for Residential, Commercial and Office Spaces. Our goal is to provide thermal comfort and acceptable indoor air quality and with many years of experience our qualified technicians have the expertise in installing any kind of HVAC as well as BBQ or Stove units for residential or commercial premises. We treat every home as our own home and we make sure you are happy with our quality of work and service before we leave you.
So whether you are looking to put a new furnace or air condition in your home or service your commercial rooftop units, its worth giving us a call.

***

Our Services:

***

Installation of all kinds of HVAC system
Servicing, repairing & maintenance of HVAC system
Clearing Red Tags
Installation of Humidification and dehumidification system
Gas Piping
24/7 call out service

***

Contact us today at: 647-968-5052

profile:
DeMarco Mechanical Services Inc. was established in 2005 by a young entrepreneur who was tired and frustrated of working for large corporations that relied on high pressure sales and scare tactics to sell equipment, lock people in to useless insurance plans and expensive contracts. DeMarco Mechanical Services is 100% Canadian and family owned. This company is built on and conducts itself with the concept of family in mind. We would not do work or leave a job that wasn’t good enough for us or our family. We are proud, consummate professionals who love what we do. Our reliability stands 2nd to none. When you call us there are no call centers or answering machines to hide behind. You get to speak to a local real live person who genuinely wants to help, not sell.

DeMarco Mechanical Services Inc. is a full service heating and cooling company.  Specializing in installation, service and maintenance of all gas fired and air conditioning equipment.  13 years in business repairing and installing equipment all over the GTA and Durham region. 


Special Offers:

1. Book a precision maintenance on your system and get a second piece of equipment inspected for half price.
2. Book an out of season single equipment precision maintenance and get 25% of the regular price
3. Sign up for our service and maintenance contracts and we will reduce the price of the precision maintenance by 25% on each piece of equipment.We will reduce the diagnostic fee by half and we will also give a 10% discount on parts and labor. No monthly payments or upfront cost to you.You only pay us when you see us
4. Furnace & Air conditioners installation starting at $1950.00 for each piece of a equipment.{selected equipment only}
5. Rewards program If you refer an installation to us and it sells we will reward you with a $50.00 gift certificate of your choice for each referral.
6. Property managers and Landloards offered special pricing

For great service contact us today!

profile:
At Tamas Mechanical we offer a broad range of heating and cooling services, as well as furnace repairs in Toronto. 

From installing new furnace and heating units, air conditioners, heat pumps and boilers to ductless air conditioners and attic air conditioner units. 

We install full duct systems and high velocity duct systems. We install air handlers that use hot water to warm air and air handlers that use electric heaters.

Give us a call - 1-866-908-2627

profile:
Summers in the city can get very hot, A to Z is here to help you in the heat of it all. You can keep cool with our quick services. No matter when your heat wave strikes, you can count on us for quick repairs from trained quality technicians.

Don’t suffer during the hot summers. Our expert services are readily available around the clock. Call A TO Z HEATING AND COOLING for all your cooling needs in the GTA and surrounding 905 areas.

Keep your home warm during the tough winters with our excellent heating services. Whether your furnace needs repairs or you need one installed you can count on us to keep your home warm.

In the business since 1992, A TO Z HEATING AND COOLING understand and know how to keep your home warm during the long harsh winters. You will get easy scheduling and direct, professional service to work around your schedule.

profile:
GreenVerse Systems Inc. is based in Toronto Ontario, proudly servicing the GTA and surrounding areas. Our energetic company employs a team of professional technicians who are on the go, responding quickly and efficiently to any of our customer’s requests.

We provide the experience, expertise, and customer service to design, install, maintain and repair all commercial/residential Heating and Cooling Systems to fit your needs.

GreenVerse was established by a group of professionals with over 15 years of experience in the Heating and Cooling business. We have since been one of the leaders in the HVAC industry in Toronto.

Only the most advanced equipment available in the market is used, for the practical day-to-day Heating and Cooling needs of all the Commercial properties and Canadian homes. Due to the exceptional quality and service provided, GreenVerse Systems Inc. has been growing at an unprecedented rate.

profile:
Founded nearly over twenty years ago, Sareena Heating & Cooling has been proudly serving the region of Toronto and the Greater Area, with licensed and registered technicians ready to troubleshoot, service and install anything and everything HVAC. As we are Homestar Verified, you can rest easy knowing all of our technicians are fully licensed and certified to work on gas and propane units. With a wealth of experience, we offer a comfortable journey for you through the entire process, leaving you with a home as clean as when we arrived. 

Whether you are a homeowner looking to upgrade, repair your existing unit, or a contractor looking to finish a renovation with ductwork, we are fully equipped and ready to meet your needs. While we are new to HomeStars, we are not new to providing our customers with a long lasting solution to their comfort sources. 

We are happy to service, maintain or install any of the following comfort products - don't see a product or service? Message us!
- Air Conditioning
- Furnaces
- Fireplaces 
- Ductless
- Ductwork
- Gas BBQs
-Pool Heaters
and more!

profile:
GS Air Systems is a highly experienced installation and service company which specializes in all areas of the trade. We are a fully insured and licensed company with experienced technicians always ready to perform the highest quality of service. We offer year-round true 24/7 emergency service and peace-of-mind service contracts. We are known in the industry for our expertise in finding innovative, most effective, efficient solutions and a reliable customer service. We pride ourselves in integrity, honesty and our ongoing commitment to continuously improve customer satisfaction.
 
Our staff members go through a demanding selection process that guarantees they will have the understanding, expertise, and technical know-how that we demand, as well as an unmatched dedication to customer service. All of us take great pride in meeting and exceeding our client’s expectations by pulling on our substantial experience in all kinds of heating systems, ventilation, and air-conditioning systems across GTA and Toronto. At GS Air Systems company we work with every customer individually to recognize and implement the heating and air conditioning solution that will perform best for you, your home or your company.
 
Our commitment to high quality and reliability sets us apart from our competition in Toronto / GTA so when you choose to work with GS Air Systems you are guaranteed to receive personal, individual attention and responsiveness to your problems and concerns. We work tirelessly to be the best in everything we do and we invite you to join our long list of satisfied customers in Toronto & the GTA who can attest to the fact that our company is the best service provider of customized, cost-effective heating and cooling products for you and your company.

profile:
We Service, repair, and install all HVAC equipment.

We started the company with the goal of offering the kind of service and support we would want for our own family. Quality and values are at the core of our business. Our home comfort advisors and technicians are highly trained, knowledgeable, and experienced to help and guide you with the best product selection.

Why HVAC service is necessary?

HVAC service is necessary for proper ventilation. It provides a sense of freshness thus making the person relaxed and happy.  A properly designed system will provide a comfortable indoor environment.

Heating and Air conditioning Maintenance:

Have you ever heard about this? Prevention is better than cure.
The reason is so simple. It is better to do the regular maintenance of your home heating and cooling system to keep them at its best efficiency level and working conditions and it will also add some more years to your precious heating and air conditioning appliances.

We are known for our expertise in the following services:

Air Conditioning systems installation and maintenance 
Furnace installation and maintenance
Tankless water heater installation
Fireplace maintenance
Air Purifier, Humidifier and Thermostat installation and maintenance
Attic Insulation
We Repair almost all heating and cooling systems
Why choose us?

Our technicians are TSSA (Technical Standards and Safety Authority) Certified.
We transform home from Energy consuming to Energy saving.
We are catering services in all regions of Durham, York, Peel region of Toronto, Brampton, Mississauga, Burlington and its surrounding GTA region.
By partnering up with today’s best suppliers in home energy, we create smart homes that can be controlled with the tap of your smartphone.


Imperial Heating has large range of heating and cooling product with extended warranties covering both parts and labour.
If you prefer financing, we can arrange flexible open contract options with competitive interest rates and monthly terms to suit your budget.

Proudly serving Canada!

HVAC4LESS is committed to providing heating, ventilation, air conditioning, new sales, maintenance and repair services at the most affordable rates. We want to make sure you spend your dollars in the most cost-effective manner, without compromising quality service.
Be it your home, or your business, hiring the best team of certified heating and cooling experts at the most competitive rates is what you get with HVAC4LESS. There is no comparison to the customer service, quality products and install that you will receive with HVAC4less.

WE ARE PROFESSIONAL
Our talent is in our people and the experiences they provide to our customers.

WE ARE TRUSTED
We’ve established our business on trust, for today and the future of our relationships.

WE ARE EXPERTS
We have one of the best rosters in the industry. All of our technicians are certified and licensed and beyond that they care about our clients. When you trust HVAC4less with your home comfort needs be assured that we will always be there when you call.

profile:
Superior Heating and Cooling Products for Your Home

At Rivercroft, we carry only the finest HVAC products for your home or business. We focus on your needs to provide you with the heating and AC equipment with top performance, energy efficiency, reliability, and long-lasting durability.


Our heating and cooling products include air conditioners, furnaces, boiler systems, air handlers. We are also happy to provide heat pumps, packaged systems, and ductless systems Along with radiant floor heating, air filtration, and humidification. At Rivercroft HVAC, our goal is to carry the HVAC systems that work best to provide a comfortable environment in your unique home.

profile:
What We Do
───
At A.C.S. we truly do believe that we maintain the highest standard of service and workmanship. 
Every element of our business is designed to deliver optimal results to you, the homeowner. 
From our industry-leading training practices to our comprehensive 120 point inspection, your needs are paramount in everything we do. 


Installation
───
Providing the optimal combination of energy efficiency and comfort our furnaces and air conditioners will save you more money while also doing their part to help the environment.
It doesn’t hurt to consider a furnace with an Annual Fuel Utilization Efficiency, also known as a AFUE rating, and an air conditioner with higher SEER ratings. 
A higher rating indicates that the furnace and air conditioner are more energy efficient, will last longer and will save you money. 
But this is only possible if it's installed to A.C.S's high standards.

Duct Cleaning
───
Whether you suffer from seasonal allergies, sinus problems, asthma or other respiratory issues, Affordable Climate Solutions superior vent and duct cleaning services are the fastest way to reduce air pollutants. 
Even cigarette smoke, pet dander and dust can be eliminated to make your heating and air conditioning systems operate more efficiently, saving you money. 
Don't let HVAC systems fall into disrepair from neglected maintenance.  
Plus have the benefit of not having to clean up dust and others particles which may be navigating through your duct system.

Repair & Maintenance
───
As professional HVAC experts, we are well-versed in both heating and cooling​ system repairs, and pride ourselves on our expertise, tools, and skilled technicians to ensure a job well done. 
A.C.S. we keep up with advanced digital technology to accommodate a wide range of brands and equipment repairs. We are dependable and professional. 
We never cut any corners when it comes to your comfort needs. Discover our commitment to quality with A.C.S.!

Attic Insulation
───
As experts we at A.C.S. agree that the majority of heat loss or gain that takes place in a home is done through its attic. 
This estimated heat loss can be as high as 45% depending on what type of insulation your attic has. 
With an alarming potential for heat loss like that it’s easy to see why you need to pay special attention to how your attic is insulated. 
In winter, when you heat your home that heat rises and your attic insulation is the first line of defense to stop that heat loss and save energy. In summer, hot humid air also penetrates into your attic and makes your home harder to cool. 

Hot Water Heating
───
After home heating, hot water tanks consume the most energy in your home. 
Control your home energy costs by choosing a more energy-efficient hot water tank .
Owning a new Water Tank helps manage cash flow, and comfort! 
Get a Smart Solution for Hot Water Heating. 
Old tanks generally contain build- up and sediment that makes it less efficient and water quality suffers. 
An A.C.S. installed water tank is energy-efficient and can help you start saving money immediately. 
You can reduce the overall costs of operating your water tank with us.

Tank-Less Solutions
───
As professional HVAC experts, we are well-versed in both heating and cooling system repairs, an​d pride ourselves on our expertise, tools, and skilled technicians to ensure a job well done. 
At A.C.S., we keep up with advanced digital technology to accommodate a wide range of brands and equipment repairs. 
We are dependable and professional. We never cut any corners when it comes to your comfort needs. Discover our commitment to quality with A.C.S!

Give us a call - 647-717-7282

profile:
Cu Mechanical is a place for straight forward advice from experts who have a vested interest in providing service to you and your family over the long term. Our company specializes in the supply, installation, and servicing of hot water (Hydronic) heating systems. We have expertise in solar, radiant floor heating, snow and ice melts and we now provide maintenance contracts. We tend to work with custom home builders, home owners and general contractors for their design and build projects. Here at Cu, we strive to bring elite quality of workmanship and customer service. We always place our customers first. We believe that you won't be satisfied until we see you smile, hence our slogan "we won't leave until we C U smile".
Check out our social media page @cu_mechanical

profile:
Heatpumps.ca is your full-service solution for heating and cooling your home. With over 20 years of industry experience, we get the job done right for you the first time. Heatpumps.ca uses only Mitsubishi Electric, fossil-free ductless heating, and cooling systems. Every unit we install conforms to the maximum energy efficiency standards. 

At Heatpumps.ca, we are conscious of the the impact heating and cooling systems have on the environment. Lowering your carbon footprint has never been easier. While reaching net-zero emissions by 2050 is a noble idea, it isn't a simple matter. Home heating is one of the most carbon-intensive industry sectors. That's why heatpumps.ca uses the most energy-efficient equipment available. With standard systems, you lose up to 50% of your heating and cooling through the ductwork. But with our units, you get more comfort at a lower cost, all while using fewer energy resources and improving your indoor air quality. As we say at Heatpumps.ca, "a greener house is a happier home". 

We're focused on providing full system installations for our customers throughout Toronto and GTA. Our professional, courteous team members will assist you with every step of the process, ensuring complete satisfaction in our services. Our goal is to exceed expectations every day.

profile:
About Us
Air Care Quality Comfort Inc. is a family-owned and operated HVAC company. We specialize in furnaces, air conditioners and hot water tank installation, repair and maintenance. We pride ourselves in providing you with excellent, knowledgeable and friendly service.
We take our responsibility very seriously when you place your trust in us. All of our technicians are certified, knowledgeable and trained to the industry standards as well as going above and beyond to ensure our customer's satisfaction. Our entire company works hard to make your experience with us hassle-free.

It is important to fix problems immediately before they cause damage, that’s why we offer emergency service 24 hours a day. Let our professional, friendly and experienced staff be there when you need us the most.

profile:
Lloyd HVAC Services Inc. is a full service Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning (HVAC) company. We are committed to providing quality, professional heating and Air Conditioning installation, repair and maintenance for residential and commercial projects; our rates are competitive and we guarantee our workmanship. 

We are centrally located in Toronto and provide service all across the Greater Toronto Area. Lloyd HVAC Services is a HRAI member company and maintain a good standing with the TSSA and WSIB. We also carry a 2 Million Dollar liability insurance to ensure that all out customers are protected. 

We work to a high and exacting standard using only qualified and experienced technicians that are always ready to respond when malfunctions occur in your heating, cooling and related equipment. 

Whether you are in need of an emergency service call, new installation or preventative maintenance & cleaning, our experienced technicians can provide you with fast, friendly service, sales and installation of various types of HVAC equipment to meet your needs and budget.

Our services include:
*Design / Build for complete HVAC Systems 
*Natural Gas Installation
*Custom Duct Work
*Furnaces
* Wall Furnaces
*Boiler 
*Hydronics
*Air Conditioning
*Ductless Heat Pump
*Ductless Air Conditioner 
*Unit Heaters
*Fireplaces
*Heat Recovery Ventilators
* Hot Water Tanks 
*Tank less Water Heaters
*Humidifiers
*Thermostats
*Filters
*Ventilation: For Gas Fired Appliances, Kitchen Exhaust, Bathroom Exhaust, Dryer Exhaust, Fresh Air Intake, Chimney Liners

profile:
AZ Systems Heating and Cooling is the Right Choice in Newmarket, Aurora, and surrounding areas!

If your HVAC system breaks down, you can trust AZ Systems Heating and Cooling to get it up and running quickly and quietly in the background. As licensed and specialized HVAC experts, we can solve any heating, air conditioning, or ventilation issue.

As Heating and Cooling systems tend to break down at the wrong moment, we know that having a repair can be a stressful time. With that in mind, AZ Systems Heating and Cooling will always be the epitome of professionalism, delivering quality work and service with a smile for all of our customers.

We want to show you that HVAC problems are not the end of the world, even though they may feel like it. For a quick and affordable fix, call AZ Systems Heating and Cooling today at 416-894-4005 to book your free in-home visitation estimate! 

Our team also services commercial work for Rooftops, Ductless Cooling and Heating, walk-in coolers and Freezers.

profile:
The founders of Parc Mechanical, Marc Samperi and Prab Kalsi, have a combined 35 years of experience in the Heating, Ventilation, Air Conditioning and Refrigeration industry. Both began their training in residential and light commercial HVAC, and moved on to complete their 313A Refrigeration and Air Conditioning apprenticeships through commercial and industrial companies to become Licensed Journeymen.

Through years of field experience, Marc and Prab are experts in the HVAC and refrigeration industry on installation and service. As service managers, and formen at top industry companies, Marc and Prab have shown excellent leadership skills in apprentice training and customer service.

profile:
Vese Heating & Cooling Proudly Provide HVAC service in GTA  Area 

We are a leading-edge home air quality and comfort company established in Mississauga Ontario. Our company proudly provide service for residents in GTA and the surrounding communities. We’re a family-owned and operated business. Meaning that every customer who entrusts us with his or her heating and air conditioning needs receives the family treatment. 

Our philosophy is “Win, Win, Win”. Our customers win first, our employees win second and our company wins third. When all three win it’s a great thing for everyone. If one loses, all three lose. This formula is the basis for our “100% Satisfaction Guarantee” and for “treating people the way we want to be treated”. When you choose Vese Heating & Cooling you cannot lose!

In addition to the many heating and air conditioning services we offer our customers we also take pride in our all-star staff. At Vese Heating & Cooling  , each person is properly trained and licensed so that he or she exceeds your expectations when providing you with a home comfort solution.

To make sure we maintain our high standards, Vese Heating & Cooling routinely conducts evaluations to reassess our goals for the betterment of both the company and our customers. By doing so, we strive to continue to provide heating and air conditioning services to residents in GTA and the surrounding area.

A family owned and operated company serving all of York Region and the Greater Toronto area.  J&S Plumbing Service Inc offers experts in Plumbing Service, Drainage Service, Heating and Air Conditioning as well as Water Filtration and Purification; 24-hours-a-day, seven-days-a-week emergency service. profile: We provide turnkey solutions to the builders and contractors by taking over the entire HVAC portion of any project. We provide licensed trades like Sheet Metal Installers, HVAC equipment installers, Gas technicians etc.. We minimize the effort on the builder/contractor side who sometimes can be exhausted by following up with different HVAC trades, enabling them to execute projects with ease. We make sure the work done by our trades have optimum quality and workmanship. We have a dedicated quality team which inspects the job before handing it over to the builder/contractor. All this at the most competitive price.

Techno Air is an organized company that provides not only heating and cooling elements but also restaurant equipment and furnace repair in Newmarket, Ontario. From sales to repair or maintenance and installation, Techno Air has everything to offer you. With years of excellence and quality, we are here to exceed our client's expectations. Likewise, we provide 100% customer satisfaction ensuring high quality and professional services.

We are proud to supply and install the most high-performance product in the market. Our products are the combination of quality with style. We only install products we are proud to stand behind because all we care about is our customer's satisfaction. Taking many advantages from sophisticated and advanced technologies, Techno Air presents heating and cooling equipment that is capable of satisfying all your cooling needs in a hot summer as well as provides you a warm environment.Techno Air has been creating luxurious home comfort for people just like you in GTA and the surrounding areas.

profile:
The HVAC Service is a leading provider of furnaces, boilers, air conditioners, water heaters, water softeners, reverse osmosis drinking systems, and home water filters in Canada. 
The HVAC Service is headquatered in Mississauga, Canada. Over 3000 satisfied customers, and more than 50 specialists in our team.
products: On The HVAC Service website you can buy HVAC equipment  buy a new HVAC unit, rent it, or repair it. Our team of professionals will help you to choose the most appropriate option for your household. We offer different types of furnaces, boilers, air conditioners, water heaters, reverse osmosis drinking water systems, air filters, air humidifiers, water softeners, home water filters from the manufacturer.
services:
If you are interested in fresh air conditioning, producing healthy and clean water, water softening, water filtration, water heating, and air heating, just let us know. Our goal is to provide you high-quality service and useful technologies. Our flexible policy gives you an opportunity both to buy the best HVAC and to rent the best HVAC. Plus, we can repair your HVAC without any hassle.
The HVAC Service is a place where you can buy HVAC systems online with 24/7 support, and have access to a responsive team of professionals and detailed consultation on any issue.

profile:
Azul Mechanical is a licensed and insured Hydronic Heating, Natural Gas and Plumbing company serving the Greater Toronto Area that specializes in boiler maintenance as well as installations. 

Whether it is for zoning, boiler maintenance, system balancing, radiator installation or radiator valve replacements - please call or email Azul Mechanical for a quote.

We specialize in boiler repairs and installations, radiant heating, snow melt systems, hot water radiator piping, installing new radiator valves, installing in-floor heating, commercial plumbing, pipefitting and natural gas. 

We sell and install cast iron and panel radiators! 

Regaining lost space could be an option in your basement!  Are low hanging pipes in the way?  

Just call Azul Mechanical (647-323-2985) or email (azulmechanical@gmail.com) to see if new copper or PEX lines in your basement ceiling space is the right choice for you and the radiant heating system in your home.

We look forward to working with you!

profile:
Heating & Air Conditioning

Hello, thank you for visiting our company profile.

My name is Jack Simon and I am the founder and president of JARICO AIR. 
We have been servicing the GTA since 1994 and my team and I are ready to help you with all your HVAC needs. We provide great service, great pricing, and great quality workmanship. 
We are not comfortable until you are.

Please call me at the office at 416-780-0020 or email me at jack@jaricoair.ca and I will be happy to help you.

For our General Manager please call Rico at 416-908-5575 or email him at rico@jaricoair.ca

For service please call our office at 416-780-0020 or email us at service@jaricoair.ca and we will help you with a smile.

If you require EMERGENCY SERVICE, please call our 24 hour service department at 416-780-0020 and we will be glad to assist you with prompt, friendly and professional service.

For Residential Maintenance Agreements, please call Wayne at 416-780-0020 or email him at wayne@jaricoair.ca

For Commercial or Residential Installations, or for Commercial Maintenance Contracts, or for any construction project, please contact Rico at 416-908-5575 or by email at rico@jaricoair.ca. 

We service and install all brands of heating, air conditioning and indoor air quality equipment. Our service and installation departments are staffed with highly skilled and trained technicians with Refrigeration licenses 313A & 313D, Sheet Metal, Gas Technician Licenses G1, G2 and G3, and Oil Technicians OBT1. We are also licensed by the CGC as Certified Geothermal Designers and Installers.

We are members of HRAI (http://www.hrac.ca/pages/), carry $5,000,000.00 liability insurance, WSIB, and are licensed by the TSSA. 

Whether you know exactly what you need or if you want our help with the design and application of any HVAC (heating, ventilation & air conditioning) or IAQ (indoor air quality) related product, our specialized design team will help you select the right system for your needs and budget. Please review some of the products and services that we offer.

profile:
GTA Heating has been providing climate solutions for heating and cooling Toronto residential homes and small commercial business's for over 10 years. For new and existing homes we provide the experience, knowledge and friendly customer service to design and install, maintain and repair all types of heating systems. Specialize in hot water heating systems, we work with radiators, gas boilers, hybrid system, tankless water heaters, hydronic radiant heating systems (radiant floors) and solar heating. We also install natural gas furnaces.
At GTA heating our service and knowledgeable installation technician will explain and help you choose the right air conditioning system to fit your home cooling needs. We specialize in installing split system air conditioning systems, and ductless air conditioning systems. Call us for your home air conditioning (AC) needs and stay cool in the summer at a low cost.
We also provide HVAC installation and a maintenance service for small commercial buildings or residential house. For new or existing buildings we can install custom sheet metal ducts that have been designed for your forced air heating and cooling needs, using quality air handlers, and natural gas furnaces that move air effectively and efficiently to maintain a consistent indoor environment for all seasons of the year.
Consult and depend on us when you need solid and trust worthy advice for your home heating and cooling needs. We can advise you by sharing in our knowledge of 3 generations, technical product specifications, alternative climate control solutions and experienced installation service to ensure you a trouble free, high efficient home heating and cooling system.

profile:
The team at Smile HVAC Service and Installation has a unique philosophy toward our customers. We focus our time and resources on building relationships on a solid foundation of trust and integrity.

Based on these guiding principles, we developed 5 rules we use every day in our customer interactions:

1. First Time Quote — We stand by our 
    technicians’ original quote, even if we end 
    up doing more work, we don’t make 
    customers pay more than the initial quoted 
    price.
2.  No Hidden Fees — No hidden fees in any of 
     our plans, all our fine print is written in 
     large font to ensure the customer 
     understands the work that is being done, 
     along with the financial details.
3.  No Cancellation Fee — If you change your 
     mind, we will cancel the work order at no 
     extra charge.
4.  Rent to Own — We offer customizable 
     financing plans available to clients 
     regardless of their financial situation.
5.  No Program Change Fee — We allow our 
     customers to switch their existing program 
     at any time without incurring additional 
     costs.

profile:
Copperhead Mechanical specializes in the supply and installation of hydronic (hot water) heating equipment. We also have expertise in solar, radiant floor heating, snow and ice melts and are pleased to now also offer Geothermal.

Our commercial division specializes in the servicing and support of multi-unit high rise residential apartment buildings for property management companies. We also have extensive experience in the installation refurbishment of mechanical rooms for high rise apartment buildings. For more information about the services we provide Property Managers.

Our residential division provides services to custom home builders/general contractors and individual home owners with their design-build projects. For more information about the services we provide.

profile:
As the third generation of the Gibb family to offer full-service mechanical contractor services in the Midwest, Robert Gibb & Sons Inc. specializes in plumbing, heating, air conditioning, electric-edge of technology and expertise with licensed electricians, journeyman plumbers, pipefitters, factory-trained technicians, and other experts in civil and mechanical engineering, residential and commercial HVAC, plumbing, sheet metal, fabrication, project management, and more. Despite the company’s high level of qualifications and experience, no job is too big or too small to undertake. 

Since 1915 when the company was founded, the Gibb family has taken pride in its commitment to excellent customer service. From multi-million dollar commercial and industrial construction projects to installing and servicing Bryant heating and cooling equipment, they understand excellence isn’t just a goal, it’s a responsibility. For more information, contact its corporate offices at 205 40th Street S. in Fargo, North Dakota or call 701-282-4400.

Address:	
205 40th St S
Fargo, ND
58103

profile:
The company offers a wide range of HVAC/R services for residential, office and commercial comfort needs.Hercules Air Systems (HAS) knows what it takes to give customers the best comfort solution and is committed to deliver on its promise.

The key in achieving air quality comfort lies in the proper HVAC/R installation. That is why Hercules Air Systems leaves no stone unturned to guarantee that installation work is above standard. The company takes great pride in its workmanship and makes sure that installations are done right the first time.

The goal of Hercules Air Systems is to deliver comfort as defined by its customers.

profile:
CAPA Heating Air Conditioning & Refrigeration is here to serve your HVAC needs quickly, efficiently and professionally with 24/7 emergency service at an affordable rate to keep you calm and comfortable at anytime.  

Specializing in service, installation, maintenance and repairs on all related HVACR equipment whether it's your system that's unfortunately malfunctioned, a newer more sophisticated energy efficient system needing upgrading or general tune ups & preventative maintenance on your existing system, CAPA Heating Air Conditioning & Refrigeration is here to satisfy your needs with peace of mind being priority. 

Service all makes and models of HVACR equipment in Residential, Commercial & Industrial sectors of the industry on:
-----------------------------------
- Furnace
- Air Conditioning 
- Water Heaters
- Unit Heaters 
- Heat Pumps
- Radiant Tube Heaters
- Ductless Splits 
- Ductwork 
- Boilers
- Humidification
- Gas Piping 
- Ventilation
- Commercial Rooftops
- Reach In Coolers 
-----------------------------------

Tel: (416)-662-4110

profile:
Airplus  is Canada's leading provider of Home Comfort and Healthy Air Solutions.  For over 25 years we have been delighting customers with professional heating, cooling, hot water and indoor air quality. We are a Trane dealer, and are specialists in boilers and hydronics. HRAI, TSSA, A+ BBB, and we offer Air Miles. Airplus - Live Healthy, Live Better. 
Some products that we deal with are Furnace, Central Air Conditioner, Boilers, Hot Water Tanks, Tankless Water Heaters, Ductless Mini-Splits, Ductless Air Conditioners, Thermostats, Humidifiers, Air Filters, Air Purifiers, Heat Pumps,Radiators,Gas Lines,Duct Cleaning, Indoor Air Quality, Furnace Filters.
